name: coronawalk
description:
Du bist in einer Welt  voller Gefahren ... leider musst du dich trotzdem mit Lebensmitteln von LEMMI versorgen .... doch der Weg ....   ist Deine Mission .  

walking through the scenes from the gamecontent from coronawalk the blender game.

SARCASTIC GAME!!!!!!!!!!!!! the real world is actually in total catastrophe an d the humans be not aware about the threatening realworld problems ...... in the game wich was never published in real world .... Corona , Cars and climatecatastrophe are nasty enemies.

I stopped the development but i will give you a "playable" version of alphavesion .
